name: J P
text: The lady on the phone tonight 10/16 Friday at 8:40PM hung up on me 6 times and all I needed was a refund for a drink. I paid for something and didn't get it. There is no excuse for being hung up on 6 times, and then answers "HELLO?" When I …More

name: Rasheed Wallace
text: So whoever was working the phone last night, a girl, was the rudest person I've ever dealt with. As a restaurant owner, these types of employees should not represent your business and need to be replaced. She answered the phone like it was her home phone. Borderline abusive attitude. Been a customer since it opened. I'm done with it.

name: Forbes McManus
text: This store is always out of ingredients and unable to fulfill orders and meet the deal that Pizza Hut offers! After 30 years of ordering from this store, I will NEVER order from Pizza Hut again!!

name: William Oats
text: It's ok but the pepperoni was old but still had that pizza hut taste. Fast has gotten terrible we eating in the house

name: Ashley Snider
text: Pizza and service are ALWAYS excellent at this location. So glad they reopened as they are definitely the best in the Midlothian area!

name: Schylur Southerland
text: Need to more people to hire. Heard the guy said it was a 3 HOUR WAIT for delivery....

text: Pizza's always tasty & service is great!

name: Sophia Martinez
text: Very fresh, very good.

name: larry southers
text: Made the pizza just like I asked. Very happy I will be back again.

name: Amy EM
text: We were very disappointed in our order. We got three different items and all were terrible (2 different pizzas and breadsticks). Even my child was unable to finish his meal. We have ordered from a different location many times and it was always decent.

name: Leslie Pendergrass
text: Pizza Hut is our fav but this one can NEVER deliver on time. The pizza has been cold..not even lukewarm the last 2 times we’ve ordered from them. I’m not sure what’s the problem. I don’t mind waiting for pizza, but they are consistently …More

name: Thomas Holton
text: Wish i could give it 0. I'd rather go back to elementary school and eat that pizza. Rude staff on top of that.

name: John Colyer
text: Called an order in to pick up, given the correct ETA, everything tasted great.

name: Sean Randolph
text: HORRIBLE!!!!!!    I’m pretty sure I’ll never go there again. That place will never be the same! First dealing with a dark pizza that I just dealt with and ate. Then Waiting a hour for pizza when I was told 30 minutes  (I live 2 min away …More

name: Daniel Pendergrass
text: I love pizza hut pizza but this pizza hut is consistantly terrible at delivery.  If you want it hot fresh and not squished you gotta carry out yourself.  This is the only pizza hut that will deliver to my house and I wish they cared a bit …More

name: Brock Mcallister
text: Hard to mess up pizza. They figured out how to do it. They did make the order correct.

name: Lamar Dixon
text: Pizza Hut was surprisingly good. I bought the Large Dinner Box and as I was eating I kept saying: This is good...This is good...

name: D. Casey
text: Pizza is very good. Service is generally kinda rude. They're not trying to be rude. They're just not trying to be nice. Which is strange... most businesses want you to come back. They could care less it seems. …More

name: Dream Financial Services Inc
text: Absolutely unacceptable customer service. When I ordered the pizza after an hour I called to check on the status and the young man working cursed at me and advised me that he was the only one working and wasn’t ordering my pizza. I will NEVER go back to this store as much as I purchase there I have never had such horrible service.

name: Spencer Stitt
text: Pineapple pepperoni all the way

name: Joe Garrison
text: Had some issues with the web site, sent order to another store, after a long fight with changing order location, the genito store is a winner, pizza was perfect

name: Willie J Bobo
text: Update Apr'19:  not nearly as good since it re-opened.  Twice now pizza had very little cheese on half the pizza. They try to get you to pay for extra cheese just to get any.  Disappointed. …More

name: Boss Allen
text: Great, made the pie the way I requested. Close to my home!

name: Eric Evenson
text: This is a typical local Pizza Hut. Good pizza, and nice workers. However, there is no seating. So, you must have your pizza delivered or take out.

text: Personally I wasnt really impressed. I ordered my food online and it told me it would be ready in 20 to 30 minutes. Unfortunately my food didnt get to me until over a hour later. I called in multiple times and no answer. When I finally got …More

text: Horrible a** customer service. But don't worry Because I will speak directly with corporate. After they mess up on my pizza. I try to call and reorder and they hang up twice on me.
